definition: a simple valve with a hinge on one side, to speak about unimportant matters rapidly and incessantly
details:
noun
- a simple valve with a hinge on one side
= synonyms: clack valve
- a sharp abrupt noise as if two objects hit together
= synonyms: clap
verb
- to speak about unimportant matters rapidly and incessantly
= synonyms: piffle, gibber, palaver, gabble, twaddle, tattle, prate, prattle, tittle-tattle, chatter, blabber, blab, maunder
- to make a clucking sounds, characteristic of hens
= synonyms: click
- to make a rattling sound
= synonyms: clatter, brattle
